CreateApp.name: CreateApp
CreateApp.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama application

CreateAppDeployment.name: CreateAppDeployment
CreateAppDeployment.description: Grants permission to deploy an AWS Panorama application

CreateAppVersion.name: CreateAppVersion
CreateAppVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an AWS Panorama application

CreateDataSource.name: CreateDataSource
CreateDataSource.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama datasource

CreateDeploymentConfiguration.name: CreateDeploymentConfiguration
CreateDeploymentConfiguration.description: Grants permission to configure a deployment for an AWS Panorama application

CreateDevice.name: CreateDevice
CreateDevice.description: Grants permission to register an AWS Panorama Appliance

CreateDeviceUpdate.name: CreateDeviceUpdate
CreateDeviceUpdate.description: Grants permission to apply a software update to an AWS Panorama Appliance

CreateInputs.name: CreateInputs
CreateInputs.description:
Grants permission to generate a list of cameras on the same network as an AWS Panorama
                                                Appliance

CreateModel.name: CreateModel
CreateModel.description: Grants permission to import a machine learning model into AWS Panorama

CreateStreams.name: CreateStreams
CreateStreams.description: Grants permission to generate a list of streams available to an AWS Panorama Appliance

DeleteApp.name: DeleteApp
DeleteApp.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Panorama application

DeleteAppVersion.name: DeleteAppVersion
DeleteAppVersion.description: Grants permission to delete a version of an AWS Panorama application

DeleteDataSource.name: DeleteDataSource
DeleteDataSource.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Panorama datasource

DeleteDevice.name: DeleteDevice
DeleteDevice.description: Grants permission to deregister an AWS Panorama Appliance

DeleteModel.name: DeleteModel
DeleteModel.description: Grants permission to delete a machine learning model from AWS Panorama

DescribeApp.name: DescribeApp
DescribeApp.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama application

DescribeAppDeployment.name: DescribeAppDeployment
DescribeAppDeployment.description: Grants permission to view details about a deployment for an AWS Panorama application

DescribeAppVersion.name: DescribeAppVersion
DescribeAppVersion.description: Grants permission to view details about a version of an AWS Panorama application

DescribeDataSource.name: DescribeDataSource
DescribeDataSource.description: Grants permission to view details about a datasource in AWS Panorama

DescribeDevice.name: DescribeDevice
DescribeDevice.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Appliance

DescribeDeviceUpdate.name: DescribeDeviceUpdate
DescribeDeviceUpdate.description: Grants permission to view details about a software update for an AWS Panorama Appliance

DescribeModel.name: DescribeModel
DescribeModel.description: Grants permission to view details about a machine learning model in AWS Panorama

DescribeSoftware.name: DescribeSoftware
DescribeSoftware.description: Grants permission to view details about a software version for the AWS Panorama Appliance

GetDeploymentConfiguration.name: GetDeploymentConfiguration
GetDeploymentConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to view details about a deployment configuration for an AWS Panorama
                                                application

GetInputs.name: GetInputs
GetInputs.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of cameras generated with CreateInputs

GetStreams.name: GetStreams
GetStreams.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of streams generated with CreateStreams

GetWebSocketURL.name: GetWebSocketURL
GetWebSocketURL.description: Grants permission to generate a WebSocket endpoint for communication with AWS Panorama

ListAppDeploymentOperations.name: ListAppDeploymentOperations
ListAppDeploymentOperations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of deployments for an AWS Panorama application

ListAppVersions.name: ListAppVersions
ListAppVersions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of application versions in AWS Panorama

ListApps.name: ListApps
ListApps.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of applications in AWS Panorama

ListDataSources.name: ListDataSources
ListDataSources.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of datasources in AWS Panorama

ListDeploymentConfigurations.name: ListDeploymentConfigurations
ListDeploymentConfigurations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of deployment configurations in AWS Panorama

ListDeviceUpdates.name: ListDeviceUpdates
ListDeviceUpdates.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of software updates for an AWS Panorama Appliance

ListDevices.name: ListDevices
ListDevices.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of appliances in AWS Panorama

ListModels.name: ListModels
ListModels.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of models in AWS Panorama

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of tags for a resource in AWS Panorama

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource in AWS Panorama

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource in AWS Panorama

UpdateApp.name: UpdateApp
UpdateApp.description: Grants permission to modify an AWS Panorama application

UpdateAppConfiguration.name: UpdateAppConfiguration
UpdateAppConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to modify the version-specific configuration of an AWS Panorama
                                                application

UpdateDataSource.name: UpdateDataSource
UpdateDataSource.description: Grants permission to modify an AWS Panorama datasource

UpdateDevice.name: UpdateDevice
UpdateDevice.description: Grants permission to modify basic settings for an AWS Panorama Appliance
